section.title: Scan receipts anywhere
section.p: Take a picture of your receipt using Wave’s mobile receipt scanning app. It can be taken amywhere no matter your location. Wave Financial is very versatile in the way we do things. You can also view them online and offline. It is key to have when running a business. We know that users are not always online so we have taken the liberty to add these functions.

section.title: Review the information
section.p: Review the receipt information before approving it. You will be able to see each reciept in detail so there is not mistake. Mistakes can be easily made so Wave Fianancial will solve those problems for you.

section.title: Sync and track your receipts
section.p: Receipts sync easily with your Wave account, so you’ll always have an accurate history of your business expenses. These expenses are important for your business. Wave Finacial is the best at helping with tracking and syncing.

section.title: Scan receipts offline
section.p: Receipts by Wave works even when it’s not connected to the Internet so you can scan receipts anytime, anywhere. The app syncs automatically the next time your device is online.

section.title: Have receipts in your inbox?
section.p: If you have a receipt that has been in your inbox for a while, you can email it to receipts@waveapps.com. The information will automatically deliver into the Wave account.
